Question: Shenzhen Transin Technologies Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Transin Technologies Co.,Ltd

Product: Switching Power Supplies

- Specializes in R&D, production, and sales of switching power supplies
- Offers power adapters and power modules meeting safety certifications
- Implements RoHS standard and follows ISO9001 and ISO14001 standards for product manufacturing
- Utilizes SMT, AOI, ICT, Automatic AI plug-in lines, Automatic spray lines, Automatic testers, and Lead-free wave soldering for advanced production testing
- Employs MES system for optimizing production management information platform
- Focuses on product quality, continuous innovation, and increasing customer value
- Operates two manufacturing centers in Shenzhen and Hunan, with a total of 1700 employees
- Hunan Transin Electric Co., Ltd. is a holding subsidiary with 500 employees and a daily production capacity of 150,000pcs per single-shift
Summary_cn:
深圳市泰瑞新科技有限公司

产品：交换电源

- 专注于交换电源的研发、生产和销售
- 提供符合安全认证的电源适配器和电源模块
- 实施RoHS标准，遵循ISO9001和ISO14001标准进行产品制造
- 利用SMT、AOI、ICT、自动AI插线、自动喷涂线、自动测试仪和无铅波峰焊等先进生产测试设备
- 采用MES系统优化生产管理信息平台
- 注重产品质量、持续创新并提高客户价值
- 在深圳和湖南设有两个生产中心，共有1700名员工
- 湖南泰瑞电气有限公司为泰瑞新的控股子公司，拥有500名员工，每日单班生产能力达15万件
